# No Light (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[0 Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 0]], [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius spread

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 100

The caster creates an area of darkness. Normal light sources cannot illuminate the area, but darkvision allows a creature to see within the area. *[[Light (Spell)|Light]]* counters *no light* (and vice versa), leaving whatever light conditions normally prevail in the overlapping areas of the spells. Higher-level light spells counter and dispel *no light*.
